title: How to Make an Inflatable Cube Out of Paper

steps.title: First, fold one sheet of square paper in half horizontally to create a crease guide and then unfold the sheet of paper.
steps.content: First, fold one sheet of square paper in half horizontally to create a crease guide and then unfold the sheet of paper. Press creases with your thumbnail to ensure clean folds, and make sure youâ€™re folding on a flat surface like a table or desk for better accuracy.

steps.title: Next, fold the sheet in half vertically to create a crease guide and then unfold the sheet of paper.
steps.content: Next, fold the sheet in half vertically to create a crease guide and then unfold the sheet of paper.

steps.title: Now, fold the sheet in half diagonally (top right corner to lower left corner) to create another crease guide and unfold the sheet of paper.
steps.content: Now, fold the sheet in half diagonally (top right corner to lower left corner) to create another crease guide and unfold the sheet of paper.

steps.title: Once again, fold the sheet in half diagonally (top left corner to lower right corner) to create a crease guide then unfold the sheet of paper.
steps.content: Once again, fold the sheet in half diagonally (top left corner to lower right corner) to create a crease guide then unfold the sheet of paper.

steps.title: Next, fold in the two side creases on the sheet until they form into a pyramid shape.
steps.content: Next, fold in the two side creases on the sheet until they form into a pyramid shape.

steps.title: Fold the triangle corners up in half so they meet at the top point.
steps.content: Fold the triangle corners up in half so they meet at the top point. Repeat on the other side of the triangle shape.

steps.title: Next, fold the right and left corners to the center of the diamond shape.
steps.content: Next, fold the right and left corners to the center of the diamond shape. Repeat on the other side of the diamond shape.

steps.title: Now fold down the small left and right side triangles in half so they meet in the center.
steps.content: Now fold down the small left and right side triangles in half so they meet in the center. Repeat this step on the other side.

steps.title: Unfold the larger left and right side and fold down in the small triangles (same triangles folded a couple steps earlier).
steps.content: Unfold the larger left and right side and fold down in the small triangles (same triangles folded a couple steps earlier). Repeat this step on the other side.

steps.title: Tuck in the small triangles gently ,as you do not want to break the corners (Repeat this step on the other side).
steps.content: Tuck in the small triangles gently ,as you do not want to break the corners (Repeat this step on the other side).

steps.title: Finally, blow into the hole at the bottom until the cube is inflated.
steps.content: Finally, blow into the hole at the bottom until the cube is inflated.
